titleStmt.title: The Unfortunate favourite, or, Memoirs on the life and actions of the late Lord Chancellour of England from his cradle to his grave. With what remarkably happen'd in his proceedings. : Together with a discourse by way of funeral sermon, on the fall of ambition.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for P. Brooksby, at the Golden-Ball, in Pye Corner,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: British Library.
